When equipped by Lone Destruction: Shadowchaser with Hanging Flame, she receives the following effect:● When Astral Ring Specialization: World Star is activated, enemies take 30.0% more Total DMG through Resonance when Lone Destruction: Shadowchaser is on the field.● The character deals 35.0% more Fire DMG when Astral Ring is not activated.

B.name: "Lantern": Guardian (B)

3_piece.name: Fluorescent Night
3_piece.effect: The character deals 25.0% more Fire DMG.When equipped by Lone Destruction: Shadowchaser, she receives the following effects:● Entering Stellar Outburst or dealing DMG on the field will grant Hanging Flame. Hanging Flame allows the character to deal 22.0% more Fire DMG for 25s. Retriggering refreshes the duration.● When Astral Ring Specialization: Wheel of Destiny is activated, enemies take 29.0% more Total DMG from team members with Harmonized Shadow Star tag in Astral Ring Charging state, and characters with Harmonized Shadow Star tag will deal 30% more Crit DMG.● When Astral Ring Specialization: World Star is activated, the character deals 30% more Total DMG through Resonance. Enemies take 25% more Total DMG and Fire DMG from characters protected by Astral Ring Specialization: World Star. Additionally, in Astral Ring Charging state, all team members with Domain Resonance tag deal 20% more Total DMG.● When Astral Ring Specialization: World Star or Astral Ring Specialization: Wheel of Destiny is activated, other team members deal 33% more Elemental DMG, and the team's Crit Rate increases by 30%.

At 4 stacks, enter Natural State for 6s (effect no longer stacks at this state). Natural State: Gain another 20% Elemental DMG. All buffs are cleared when Natural State ends.

3_piece.name: Chairoscuro
3_piece.effect: For every friendly summoned entity present, the host gains 15% Total DMG Reduction. CD: 10s. Stacks up to 3 times. Each hit taken removes 1 stack.

T.name: Carlo Collodi (T)
T.skill_description: Total DMG increases by 25.0%. Fire DMG dealt by ranged attacks increases by 40.0%.

M.name: Carlo Collodi (M)
M.skill_description: When an entity summoned is spawned or defeated, all enemies take 20.0% bonus Fire DMG from the host for 15.0s (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. Ultimate Evasion skill CD is reduced by 20.0%.

B.name: Carlo Collodi (B)
B.skill_description: Fire DMG increases by 60.0%. Restore 2.0 SP and 20 HP per sec for 5s after entering burst mode. Triggering it again resets the duration.

2_piece.name: Puppets' Encounter
2_piece.effect: Total DMG increases by 30.0%. Increases self's Fire DMG by 40.0% in burst mode.

3_piece.name: True Heart
3_piece.effect: When attacks land on targets, Fire DMG increases by 3.0% for 8s, up to 5 stacks. Triggering it again resets the duration. Enhance self after entering burst mode and gain 15.0% bonus Total DMG for 18s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

M.name: Carole: Part-time Job (M)
M.skill_description: Increases Physical DMG by 15,0%. If there has been no Crit hit within 5 consecutive attacks, the chance of the next attack being a Crit hit is increased by 100%.

M.name: Carole: ^.< (M)
M.skill_description: Physical DMG dealt against stunned targets increases by 30,0%.

T.name: Cecilia - Hawaii (T)
T.skill_description: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) gain 10% Physical DMG. Kiana or Kallen equip bonus: Allies within a 4-meter radius heal 20 HP every 3s.

T.name: Cecilia Schariac (T)
T.skill_description: Two stars, one black and one white, glitter overhead (collect the 2-piece set to illuminate them). Black Star shines: Basic attacks gain 30% (50% at 5★) Physical DMG. White Star shines: Combo attacks gain 30% (50% at 5★) Physical DMG.

M.name: Cecilia Schariac (M)
M.skill_description: Two stars, one black and one white, glitter overhead (collect the 2-piece set to illuminate them). Black Star shines: Basic attacks recover 1 (4 at 5★) more SP; CD: 1.5s. White Star shines: Combo attacks heal self for 1% (2% at 5★) HP; CD: 1.5s.

B.name: Cecilia Schariac (B)
B.skill_description: Two stars, one black and one white, glitter overhead (collect the 2-piece set to illuminate them). Black Star shines: Gain 25% (40% at 5★) Attack Speed. White Star shines: Gain 20% (40% at 5★) Total DMG Reduction against enemy attacks.

2_piece.name: Wheel of Destiny
2_piece.effect: Illuminates a black star and a white star. Black Star shines: Basic attacks have a 20% chance to gain 1,000% ATK of Physical DMG to non-Boss enemies; CD: 5s. White Star shines: combo attacks gain 30% Crit Rate.

3_piece.name: Twin Stars
3_piece.effect: When deployed, every time the two stars switch, character gains 12% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 3 times. Stacks are cleared once the character exits the battle.

T.name: Cecilia: Pale Moon (T)
T.skill_description: When hitting enemies with Combo ATKs, host deals 10,0% more Physical DMG for 3s. Max stacks: 2. Triggering this again resets the duration.

T.name: Cecilia: Youth (T)
T.skill_description: Increases Ice DMG by 30%. When the Dance with Me effect from the bottom piece of the set is activated and the max HP of the host is greater than or equal to 2000/6000, team Total DMG increases by 12,0%/15,0%. Every 500 max HP over 6000 max HP further increases team Total DMG by 2%, up to 10% (exclusive).

M.name: Cecilia: Youth (M)
M.skill_description: Increases Total DMG by 20,0%. Charged ATK or Ultimate deals an additional 200,0% ATK of Ice DMG on hit (CD: 5s). Weapon active further deals 30,0% more Total DMG. Every 500 max HP over 6000 max HP extends Dance With Me's effect by 0.5s for a maximum of 2.5s (exclusive).

B.name: Cecilia: Youth (B)
B.skill_description: Increases Ice DMG by 25%. Casting weapon active will send the whole team into Dance with Me state for 10s (exclusive). If the max HP of the host is greater than or equal to a 2000/6000, all team members deal more 20,0%/25,0% Elemental DMG. Every 500 max HP over 6000 max HP further increases team Total DMG by 2%, up to 10%. Sugary Starburst equip bonus: Casting QTE and Ultimate also triggers this effect.

2_piece.name: Momentary Luster
2_piece.effect: Increases Total DMG by 20,0%. Within 12s of entering battle, the total Elemental DMG received by all enemies on the field increases by 15,0% (exclusive).

3_piece.name: Meaningful Hope
3_piece.effect: QTE and weapon active increase Ice DMG by 30,0%. Dealing DMG with Ultimate triggers Dance with Me state and increases Ice DMG by an additional 35,0%. Within 12s of entering battle, the Total DMG received by all enemies on the field increases by 6,0%. Triggering it again resets the duration (exclusive). Every 500 max HP over 6000 max HP further increases team Total DMG by 2.5%, up to 12.5%. Sugary Starburst equip bonus: T, M, B, and 3-piece set bonuses will be maxed out.

T.name: Cezanne (T)
T.skill_description: Physical DMG increases by 15.0%. Boosts Physical DMG dealt by Ultimate by 27.0% for a short duration after triggering any of the team's Ultimate. Can trigger once every 10s (cannot stack).

M.name: Cezanne (M)
M.skill_description: Increases Bleed Trauma inflicted by wielder by 25.0%. When enemies take Bleed DMG, Bleed DMG is increased by 20.0% for 10.0s (cannot be stacked but can be reset).

B.name: Cezanne (B)
B.skill_description: When hitting character's Combo ATK, all enemies are inflicted with Structure Outline, increasing their Total DMG received by 36.0% for 6s. CD: 16s. Team's characters are enhanced once. Entering the field again clears the enhancement and causes Structure Outline to last 1.5s longer, up to a maximum of 9s. Structure Outline can only be stacked twice.

2_piece.name: Shading Soul
2_piece.effect: Gain 1 stack when dealing Bleed DMG to enemies. Upon gaining 10 stacks, Physical DMG dealt to enemies increases by 500.0%, clearing all stacks. This DMG counts as Bleed DMG (Gain stacks once every 0.3s, DMG CD: 5.0s. Unable to gain stacks during CD). When equipped by Starry Impression with B-piece, unleashing Ultimate inflicts Structure Outline on enemies and enhances team. When Structure Outline ends, Total DMG received by enemies increases by 36% for 12s. Structure Outline enters a 20s CD. Can only trigger once in every 20s.

3_piece.name: Opal Bonds
3_piece.effect: Wielder gains 35.0% ATK Speed. After using Ultimate, when attacking enemies with broken or no shield, Total DMG dealt is increased by 2.0% for every stack of Bleed inflicted on the enemies (maximum of 10.0%) for 20s. This effect cannot stack and triggering it again resets the duration.

T.name: Charlemagne (T)
T.skill_description: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 2% (4% at 4★) Physical DMG for every 5% of SP above a 70% threshold.

M.name: Charlemagne (M)
M.skill_description: Gain 50% (75% at 4★) DEF at 70% or higher SP.

B.name: Charlemagne (B)
B.skill_description: Gain 15% (25% at 4★) Move Speed at 70% or higher SP.

2_piece.name: Fränkischen Herrscher
2_piece.effect: At 70% or higher SP, surrounding enemies lose 20% ATK and 20% DEF.

3_piece.name: Joyeuse
3_piece.effect: When attacking MECH-type enemies, gain 20% Physical DMG. Mei or Yae Sakura equip bonus: Gain 25% HP in battle.

2_piece.name: Basic DMG Boost
2_piece.effect: Gain 8% Physical DMG.

3_piece.name: DEF Enhance
3_piece.effect: Gain 20% DEF in battle.

T.name: Asuka (T)
T.skill_description: Host deals 20.0% bonus Physical DMG and after landing a Charged ATK, she deals 30.0% bonus Crit DMG for 4s (can be refreshed).

M.name: Rei (M)
M.skill_description: Host deals 20.0% bonus Total DMG and against single enemies, she deals 20.0% bonus Crit DMG.

B.name: Mari (B)
B.skill_description: Host has 15.0% bonus Crit Rate. Every attack against the same target deals 3% more Physical DMG (15% max). Reset if no attacks in 10s or target changes.

2_piece.name: Combat Sync
2_piece.effect: When Charged ATKs hit, if there is no more than one enemy within 8m, host deals 45.0% bonus Total DMG for 6s.

3_piece.name: Battle-tested
3_piece.effect: Charged ATKs deal 200.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. CD: 6s. Asuka equip bonus: Charged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Physical DMG and in enhanced form, the CD drops to 3s.

T.name: Cleopatra (T)
T.skill_description: Gain 41% Total DMG Multiplier against enemy with broken Elite Shield.

M.name: Cleopatra (M)
M.skill_description: Attacks against stunned enemies gain 82% Total DMG Multiplier.

B.name: Cleopatra (B)
B.skill_description: Attacks against paralyzed enemies gain 82% Total DMG Multiplier.

2_piece.name: Gun Kata
2_piece.effect: Gain 25% Move Speed. Kiana or Kallen equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.

3_piece.name: Speeding Bullet
3_piece.effect: Enemies further away get hit harder. Ranged attacks gain 5% Physical DMG for every meter of distance to the target. Max stacks: 10.

T.name: Cocolia (T)
T.skill_description: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 20% Physical DMG. When an entity summoned by the host is on the field, gain 25% Crit DMG.

M.name: Cocolia (M)
M.skill_description: Gain 10% Max HP in battle. Enemy attacks suffer 15% Total DMG Reduction.

B.name: Cocolia (B)
B.skill_description: The host gains 13% Attack Speed. After Ultimate Evasion, unit summoned by the host gains 40% Physical DMG for 6s. CD: 8s

2_piece.name: Charging Defense
2_piece.effect: When an host-summoned entity is attacked, she takes 50% less Total DMG for 7s. CD: 21s.

3_piece.name: Explosive Armor
3_piece.effect: When the Charging Defense ends, it explodes to deal 500% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies in a large area.

T.name: Columbus (T)
T.skill_description: Host deals 20.0% bonus Physical DMG and after landing a Charged ATK, she deals 30.0% bonus Crit DMG for 4s (can be refreshed).

M.name: Columbus (M)
M.skill_description: Host deals 20.0% bonus Total DMG and against single enemies, she deals 20.0% bonus Crit DMG.

B.name: Columbus (B)
B.skill_description: Host has 15.0% bonus Crit Rate. Every attack against the same target deals 3% more Physical DMG (15% max). Reset if no attacks in 10s or target changes.

2_piece.name: Combat Sync
2_piece.effect: When Charged ATKs hit, if there is no more than one enemy within 8m, host deals 45.0% bonus Total DMG for 6s.

3_piece.name: Battle-tested
3_piece.effect: Charged ATKs deal 200.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. CD: 6s. Asuka equip bonus: Charged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Physical DMG and in enhanced form, the CD drops to 3s.

T.name: Dante (T)
T.skill_description: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 5★) Crit Rate. The host gains Mantle when hit by an enemy which boosts her Physical DMG by 4.0% (8.0% at 5★) for 10s; CD: 10s. The host gains Perfect Mantle upon Ultimate Evasion or Retaliation, which boosts her Physical DMG by 8.0% (16.0% at 5★) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Perfect Mantle will replace Mantle in cases of overlap.

M.name: Dante (M)
M.skill_description: The host gains 15.0% (30.0% at 5★) Physical DMG. The host gains Mantle when hit by an enemy, which boosts her Crit DMG by 7.5% (15.0% at 5★) for 10s; CD: 10s. The host gains Perfect Mantle upon Ultimate Evasion or Retaliation, which boosts her Crit DMG by 15.0% (30.0% at 5★) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Perfect Mantle will replace Mantle in cases of overlap.

B.name: Dante (B)
B.skill_description: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 5★) Attack Speed. The host gains Mantle when hit by an enemy, which boosts her Total DMG by 5.0% (10.0% at 5★) for 10s; CD: 10s. The host gains Perfect Mantle upon Ultimate Evasion or Retaliation, which boosts her Total DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5★) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Perfect Mantle will replace Mantle in cases of overlap.

2_piece.name: La Vita Nuova
2_piece.effect: The host gains 20.0% Crit DMG. The host gains 30.0% Physical DMG for 10s upon entering Burst mode or hitting an enemy with Charged ATK in Burst mode; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Durandal equip bonus: CD of Ultimate Evasion / Retaliation shortens by 20%.

3_piece.name: Divine Comedy
3_piece.effect: In Burst mode, the host deals 30.0% more DMG against shields, and her Charged ATKs can impair unimpaired enemies, reducing their DEF by 40.0% for 8s. Durandal equip bonus: The impairing debuff reduces enemy DEF by 60.0% instead.

T.name: Dark Jixuanyuan (T)
T.skill_description: When global Time Fracture is triggered, deal 300% (450% at 5★) ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies and knock them back. CD: 20s.

M.name: Dark Jixuanyuan (M)
M.skill_description: When global Time Fracture is active, gain 15% (30% at 5★) Crit Rate.

B.name: Dark Jixuanyuan (B)
B.skill_description: When global Time Fracture is active, gain 15% (30% at 5★) Move Speed and 10% (25% at 5★) Attack Speed.

2_piece.name: Blade of Darkness
2_piece.effect: When global Time Fracture is active, gain 40% Physical DMG. Kiana or Kallen equip bonus: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 4 additional SP. CD: 2s.

3_piece.name: Daughter of Darkness
3_piece.effect: When Time Fracture is active, active skills consumes 30% less SP.

T.name: Darwin (T)
T.skill_description: For every 15 Combo Hit Count, gain 8% Lightning DMG dealt. Stacks up to 4 times. DMG buff applies for current combat (host's death dispels the buff).

M.name: Darwin (M)
M.skill_description: For every 1 hit taken by the host, gain 7% Total DMG Reduction. Stacks up to 4 times. DMG Reduction buff applies for current combat (host's death dispels the buff).

B.name: Darwin (B)
B.skill_description: For every Ultimate Evasion performed by the host, gain 6% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 4 times. DMG buff applies for current combat (host's death dispels the buff).

2_piece.name: Origin of Shields
2_piece.effect: Gains a shield upon entry. The shield disappears upon taking an enemy hit and inflicts a 3s paralysis on nearby enemies. Shield appears again after 10s. When the shield is active, character gains 20% Lightning DMG.

3_piece.name: Wings of Life
3_piece.effect: Gain 20% Lightning DMG and 20% faster Move Speed. The shield of the Origin of Shields disappears after taking 2 hits.

T.name: Theresa: Late for Work (T)
T.skill_description: As the team leader:● Increases Lightning DMG by 40.0%.When equipped by Schicksal's Imperative:● If she is the team leader:○ Lightning DMG increases by another 30%.● When Astral Ring is not activated:○ Teammates deal 40.0% more Lightning DMG.● When Wheel of Destiny is activated:○ The team deals 30.0% more Total DMG.

M.name: Theresa: At Work (M)
M.skill_description: Total DMG increases by 10.0%.When equipped by Schicksal's Imperative:● Enemies take 12.0% more Lightning DMG from the character.● When World Star is activated:○ When the character is not the team leader:◆ The team deals 53.0% more Total DMG.

B.name: Theresa: After Work (B)
B.skill_description: Enemies take 16.0% more Total DMG from the character.When equipped by Schicksal's Imperative:● When Astral Ring is not activated:○ After triggering Work Done in Dreams, enemies take 60.0% more Lightning DMG from the character for 18s. Retriggering refreshes the duration.● When World Star is activated:○ When the character is the team leader:◆ She deals 60.0% more Total DMG.◆ Enemies take 30% more Lightning DMG from the character during Stellar Outburst.

2_piece.name: Want to Escape Today
2_piece.effect: Ultimate and ATKs in burst mode deal 30% more Total DMG.When equipped by Schicksal's Imperative and she has Working:● When World Star is activated:○ During Stellar Outburst:◆ Enemies on the field take 20.0% more Total DMG from teammates.◆ Teammates deal 10.0% more Lightning DMG.○ During Astral Ring Charging, the character deals 60.0% more Lightning DMG.● When Wheel of Destiny is activated:○ Enemies take 16% more Physical DMG from teammates during Stellar Outburst.

3_piece.name: Tomorrow Will Be The Same
3_piece.effect: When the character is the team leader:● Lightning DMG increases by 40.0% during Stellar Outburst.When equipped by Schicksal's Imperative:● Entering Stellar Outburst or casting Ultimate grants Working. Working increases the character's Total DMG by 10.0% for 25s. Retriggering refreshes the duration.● When Astral Ring is not activated:○ When Work Is Over Alarm hits, teammates deal 36% more Total DMG for 16s. Retriggering refreshes the duration.● When Wheel of Destiny is activated:○ Enemies take 20.0% more Total DMG from characters with the Harmonized Shadow Star trait during Astral Ring Charging.○ Increases the Crit Rate of characters with the Harmonized Shadow Star trait by 10%.● When World Star is activated:○ The character's Resonance deals 30% more Total DMG.○ Enemies take 20% more Elemental DMG from characters protected by World Star, and take 15% more Lightning DMG.○ Characters with the Domain Resonance trait deals 8% more Total DMG during Astral Ring Charging.● When World Star or Wheel of Destiny is activated:○ During Stellar Outburst:◆ Teammates deal 20% more Elemental DMG and Physical DMG.◆ The team deals 10% more Total DMG.

T.name: Detective Durandal (T)
T.skill_description: After Ultimate Evasion, Charged ATKs deal 20,0% bonus Total DMG for 5s. CD: 10s.

T.name: Dickens (T)
T.skill_description: Boosts Physical DMG by 30.0%. Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs grant 1 charge on hit. 5 charges max. CD: 1s. Ultimate consumes all charges and every charge consumed restores 40.0 HP.

M.name: Dickens (M)
M.skill_description: Boosts Physical DMG by 30.0%. Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs grant 1 charge on hit. 5 charges max. CD: 1s. Ultimate consumes all charges and every charge consumed deals 100.0% ATK of Physical DMG in a small area.

B.name: Dickens (B)
B.skill_description: Boosts Total DMG by 25.0%. Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs grant 1 charge on hit. 5 charges max. CD: 1s. Ultimate consumes all charges and every charge consumed restores 1.0 SP.

2_piece.name: Foe of Industrialists
2_piece.effect: Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs deal 20.0% bonus Physical DMG and an additional 15.0% bonus Physical DMG against MECH enemies. Casting Ultimate boosts Total DMG of Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs by 20.0% for 8s. Can be refreshed.

3_piece.name: Social Truth
3_piece.effect: Casting Ultimate reduces Total DMG taken by 30.0% and improves Ignore Interrupt for 8s. When equipped by the Olenyevas, charges of individual stigmata start at 5 and max at 8. The starting charge bonus can proc once every 10min in Open World.

T.name: Dirac (T)
T.skill_description: Gain 10.0% Crit Rate. After entry or unleashing weapon skills, the host gains another 10.0% Crit Rate for 9s. This effect cannot stack.

M.name: Dirac (M)
M.skill_description: Ultimate/Burst ATKs deal 26.0% more Total DMG. During Burst mode, the host gains 26.0% Total DMG, and another 1.5% Total DMG per second after unleashing Ultimate or entering Burst mode; stacks up to 9 times; lasts 9s, during which the effect cannot be triggered again.

B.name: Dirac (B)
B.skill_description: Host gains 20.0% Physical DMG. After Ultimate Evasion or triggering evasion skill, host gains 1.5 SP/s for 9s (effect does not trigger again during this time).

2_piece.name: 2nd Quantization
2_piece.effect: If any 2 stigmata effects are active, gain 35.0% Physical DMG. When this effect is triggered, the durations of both stigmata effects are reset and extended to 14s.

3_piece.name: Dirac Equation
3_piece.effect: If all 3 stigmata effects are active, Ultimate/Burst mode ATKs also apply Impair to non-impaired enemies on hit, lowering their DEF by 50.0% for 3s. When this effect is triggered, the durations of all 3 stigmata effects are reset and extended to 18s.

M.name: Diva Bronya (M)
M.skill_description: When there are two enemies on the battlefield, the host gains 20.0% (30.0% at 4★) Ice DMG.

T.name: Dracula (T)
T.skill_description: Attacks against bleeding enemies gain 40% Physical DMG.

M.name: Dracula (M)
M.skill_description: Hits on bleeding enemies recover 3.0% HP and 3.0% SP for self. CD: 4s.

B.name: Dracula (B)
B.skill_description: For every bleeding enemy on the battlefield, the host gains 12% Attack Speed and 4.0% Crit Rate. Stacks up to 3 times.

2_piece.name: Kindred
2_piece.effect: Upon scoring a crit hit, summon 1 Kindred that lasts 10s, and resets the duration of all existing Kindreds. The Kindred deals 50% ATK of Physical DMG (DMG is directly based on the host and benefit from the host's stat bonuses). Up to 3 Kindreds can exist at the same time, each increasing the host's Crit DMG by 15%.

3_piece.effect: When HP is below 1%, activate Revival Mode that lasts 5s, during which the host cannot attack nor move but is invincible and heals 20% of HP per second. When Revival Mode ends, knock surrounding enemies airborne and bleed them for 5s, dealing 20% ATK of Physical DMG per second. CD: 300s.

T.name: Kiana: Dragon Boat (T)
T.skill_description: Combo ATKs gain 10% (20% at 4★) Physical DMG and 3% (5% at 4★) Crit Rate.

M.name: Mei: Dragon Boat (M)
M.skill_description: Attacks have a 10% chance to inflict 3 Paralyze Trauma. CD: 7s.

B.name: Bronya: Dragon Boat (B)
B.skill_description: Shortens debuff durations by 15% (30% at 4★). Switch skills (including QTE) gain 15% (25% at 4★) Physical DMG.

2_piece.name: Aromatic Bath
2_piece.effect: Gain 10% Max SP in battle. Gain 10% Max HP in battle.

3_piece.name: Medicinal Wine
3_piece.effect: When HP is above 70%, gain 6% Physical DMG for every 5% of HP exceeded.
